code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  maxDistance ( vector < int >&  colors )  {     const  int  n  =  colors . size ();   int  i  =  0 ;    int  j  =  n  -  1 ;    while  ( colors [ i ]  ==  colors . back ())   ++ i ;   while  ( colors [ j ]  ==  colors . front ())   -- j ;   return  max ( n  -  1  -  i ,  j );   }  };
